title: 가정법 도치 심화
description: Were/Should + S + V 형태를 질문형처럼 응용해봅니다.
examples: Were the situation to change, how would we adapt our strategy?
Should the project fail, what alternative plans do we have?
Were I to accept this offer, would you support my decision?
learning_points: 가정법 도치를 질문 형태로 응용하는 고급 표현 기법

sentences.kr: 만약 상황이 바뀐다면, 우리는 어떻게 전략을 조정할 것인가?
sentences.en: Were the situation to change, how would we adapt our strategy?

sentences.kr: 만약 프로젝트가 실패한다면, 우리에게는 어떤 대안 계획이 있는가?
sentences.en: Should the project fail, what alternative plans do we have?

sentences.kr: 만약 내가 이 제안을 받아들인다면, 당신이 내 결정을 지지해 줄 것인가?
sentences.en: Were I to accept this offer, would you support my decision?

sentences.kr: 만약 경제가 더 악화된다면, 우리는 어떤 조치를 취해야 할 것인가?
sentences.en: Were the economy to worsen further, what measures should we take?

sentences.kr: 만약 새로운 경쟁자가 나타난다면, 우리의 시장 점유율은 어떻게 될 것인가?
sentences.en: Should a new competitor emerge, what would happen to our market share?

sentences.kr: 만약 기술이 더 발전한다면, 현재 직업들의 미래는 어떻게 될 것인가?
sentences.en: Were technology to advance further, what would be the future of current jobs?

sentences.kr: 만약 투자가 성공하지 못한다면, 우리는 어떻게 손실을 만회할 것인가?
sentences.en: Should the investment not succeed, how would we recover the losses?

sentences.kr: 만약 글로벌 규제가 바뀐다면, 우리 사업 모델에는 어떤 영향이 있을 것인가?
sentences.en: Were global regulations to change, what impact would there be on our business model?
